name: Cerastes
text: Phew. Victory is mine!
Having revealed her true form, Cerastes had constricted the basilisk with her overwhelming strength and shattered its scales.
Perhaps the basilisk had finally remembered that this woman, a Nagi, was its master and seemingly shook its tail in surrender, but it was too late.
Having taken bullets directly in its bare flesh, it sank into the underground lake in the midst of its death throes.

name: Me
text: Brilliant.

name: Cerastes
text: What's with that thing? Its body was huge but in the end it wasn't even that big of a deal?

name: Me
text: No, that thing definitely is a big deal. You being a Nagi saved our asses. Thanks to you, we were able to rescue our comrades.

name: Cerastes
text: I don't really get it, though. Explain it to me properly, what exactly is this basilisk?

name: Me
text: In the Devildom, basilisks are known as underlings of the Nagi.

name: Cerastes
text: Underlings... I see. So that's why its petrification and poison didn't work on me.

name: Cerastes
text: But then, why was it being called a Serpent God and sleeping in a place like this?

name: Me
text: This is just a hunch, but... long ago, there used to be a Gate to the Devildom around here, and a castle was built on top of it.

name: Me
text: The lord of that castle apparently brought demonic creatures from the Devildom through that gate and ruled his people through fear.

name: Cerastes
text: So that thing was one of them huh?

name: Me
text: Yeah. Eventually, the gate closed and it couldn't return to the Devildom, so it must have fallen into a slumber here.

name: Me
text: And I guess people happened to witness it and that's how it turned into that Snake God story.

name: Cerastes
text: Hmm. As long as that's not my future form, then whatever.

name: Me
text: Don't worry about that. I know a Nagi who seems to have lived for hundreds of years yet has still retained her beautiful looks.

name: Cerastes
text: What did you say!?
The moment Cerastes returned to her human form, she grabbed me by the collar and snapped at me so vigorously that I involuntarily leaned back.

name: Me
text: I-Is that so surprising?

name: Cerastes
text: You're acquainted with a Nagi? Let me meet her!

name: Me
text: Well, maybe acquaintance isn't the best way to put it...
It was Snake Lady, the Nagi warrior who had abducted Hebiko to Chaos Arena.
Her personality was brutal and ruthless. Even out of all the people I had met so far, her strength was on a totally different level.

name: Me
text: (Those eyes... Just remembering them sends chills down my spine.)
She was definitely on a different level even amongst the Nagi, and surely calling her a Serpent God would have been fitting.

name: Cerastes
text: I've been treated as an outcast since I was little and it was my dream to meet a kindred Nagi.

name: Cerastes
text: And even in this cave, I thought there must be some connection between the legend of the Serpent God and the Nagi, so that's why I came all the way out here.

name: Me
text: I see. ...But she's not my acquaintance and I also don't know where she is now.

name: Cerastes
text: I see... But she's in Japan, right?

name: Me
text: Probably.
I'll let you live for nowーThat was what that woman had said.

name: Me
text: (If we keep fighting like this, I have a feeling that she'll show up again someday.)

name: Cerastes
text: Alright, then I've decided! I'll be staying in Japan for the time being, so let me know if you find her.

name: Me
text: I don't mind doing that, but...

name: Cerastes
text: Of course, I'm not asking you to do it for free. I'll even help you with your ninja work if you want. I'm actually pretty confident in my skills!
Cerastes forcefully carried on the conversation and pushed her contact info on me.

name: Me
text: (Well, she seems to be pretty skilled, and I guess it's good to strengthen our forces...)
I thought about how, when we eventually battled Snake Lady again, she would become our allyーor, maybe our enemyーand accepted her contact info.

name: Cerastes
text: Oh, right! Next, let me take a picture!

name: Me
text: Huh? A picture? Of me?

name: Cerastes
text: Who else is there!?

name: Me
text: I mean, I'm kind of still on a mission, so that's a bit...

name: Cerastes
text: Come on, I'm taking it. Please do a ninja-y pose.
Cerastes didn't listen to a word I said and pointed the camera of her smartphone my way.

name: Me
text: Huh? Eh? I said stop itー
*Click*ー

name: Cerastes
text: No good, one more!

name: Me
text: Uwaaah...!
